EmailTemplate.description: Local email for Tom Tarantino's HVAC testimony
EmailTemplate.name: Support IAVA on Capitol Hill
EmailTemplate.subject: Support IAVA on Capitol Hill
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Join Senior Legislative Associate Tom Tarantino this Friday, June 15th, as he goes to Capitol Hill to continue the fight for the Veterans Opportunity to Work Act.
What: Support Tom as he testifies before Congress on the H.R. 2433. Where: Meet at the IAVA DC Office 777 North Capitol NE, Suite 403 Washington, DC 20002
When: Breakfast at 9 a.m. then walk over with the IAVA staff to the Capitol.
Dress: Professional
RSVP by logging on at <http://iava.org/come-watch-iava-testify>.
Thanks,
Nick
Nick Colgin Membership Intern Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America
